description: Detects suspicious powershell process which includes bxor command, alternative obfuscation method to b64 encoded commands.
author: Sami Ruohonen
Harish Segar (improvement)
Tim Shelton
name: Suspicious XOR Encoded PowerShell Command Line
query: ((((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Windows PowerShell") OR (Product:"PowerShell Core 6")) AND process.command_line.text:(*bxor* OR *\-join\ * OR *\-join'* OR *\-join\"* OR *\-join`* OR *char*)) AND (NOT (((process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Program Files\Amazon\SSM\ssm-document-worker.exe")) OR ((process.command_line.text:*function\ Convert\-GuidToCompressedGuid* AND process.command_line.text:*ValueFromPipelineByPropertyName* AND process.command_line.text:*\:\:ParseExact\(* AND process.command_line.text:*KB\[000000\-999999\]*)))))
